languages.text: {n}Прижавшись к вам всем телом и закрыв глаза, Джай дарит вам долгий поцелуй и тихо шепчет:{/n} "На самом деле так не бывает. Это все долгий сон, но я запрещаю себе просыпаться, ведь после него мне не нужна настоящая жизнь".

{n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."
languages.original_text: {n}Прижавшись к вам всем телом и закрыв глаза, Джай дарит вам долгий поцелуй и тихо шепчет:{/n} "На самом деле так не бывает. Это все долгий сон, но я запрещаю себе просыпаться, ведь после него мне не нужна настоящая жизнь".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊紧紧地贴着你，闭上双眼，给了你一个缠绵的吻。她轻声说道。{/n}“这一切并不是真的，这只是个悠长的梦境，但我拒绝从梦中醒来。因为有了这场梦，我就不再需要现实了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊紧紧地贴着你，闭上双眼，给了你一个缠绵的吻。她轻声说道。{/n}“这一切并不是真的，这只是个悠长的梦境，但我拒绝从梦中醒来。因为有了这场梦，我就不再需要现实了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}全身をあなたに押し付けて目を閉じたジェイは、余韻の残るようなキスをして囁く。{/n}「こんなことになるなんて思わなかった。まるで長い夢のよう。でも、目を覚ましたくないの…もう、本物の生なんて必要ない」
languages.original_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."

traits.locale_text: {n}全身をあなたに押し付けて目を閉じたジェイは、余韻の残るようなキスをして囁く。{/n}「こんなことになるなんて思わなかった。まるで長い夢のよう。でも、目を覚ましたくないの…もう、本物の生なんて必要ない」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae aprieta su cuerpo contra el tuyo, cierra los ojos y te da un largo beso, susurrando:{/n} «Las cosas no funcionan así. No es más que un largo sueño. Pero me niego a despertar. Después de esto, no necesito la vida real».
languages.original_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae aprieta su cuerpo contra el tuyo, cierra los ojos y te da un largo beso, susurrando:{/n} «Las cosas no funcionan así. No es más que un largo sueño. Pero me niego a despertar. Después de esto, no necesito la vida real».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Collant son corps tout entier contre le vôtre, Jae ferme les yeux et vous embrasse longuement, puis elle murmure :{/n} « Ça ne se passe jamais vraiment comme ça. Tout ça n'est qu'un long rêve, mais je refuse de me réveiller... Après ça, je n'ai plus besoin de la réalité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Collant son corps tout entier contre le vôtre, Jae ferme les yeux et vous embrasse longuement, puis elle murmure :{/n} « Ça ne se passe jamais vraiment comme ça. Tout ça n'est qu'un long rêve, mais je refuse de me réveiller... Après ça, je n'ai plus besoin de la réalité. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae drückt ihren ganzen Körper dicht an dich heran und schließt die Augen. Dann gibt sie dir einen langen Kuss und flüstert:{/n} "Ganz so ist es eigentlich nicht. Eigentlich ist alles eher wie ein langer Traum, aus dem ich nicht erwachen will – danach brauche ich das echte Leben nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae drückt ihren ganzen Körper dicht an dich heran und schließt die Augen. Dann gibt sie dir einen langen Kuss und flüstert:{/n} "Ganz so ist es eigentlich nicht. Eigentlich ist alles eher wie ein langer Traum, aus dem ich nicht erwachen will – danach brauche ich das echte Leben nicht mehr."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."

languages.text: {n}Bedeninin tüm ağırlığıyla sana yaslanan ve gözlerini kapatan Jae, seni uzunca öpüp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Gerçekte böyle şeyler olmaz. Bu yalnızca uzun bir rüya ama ben uyanmayı reddediyorum. Buna sahipsem gerçek hayatı neyleyeyim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pressing her whole body close to you and closing her eyes, Jae gives you a lingering kiss and whispers,{/n} "It doesn't really happen like that. It's all one long dream, but I refuse to let myself wake up — after this, I have no need for real life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bedeninin tüm ağırlığıyla sana yaslanan ve gözlerini kapatan Jae, seni uzunca öpüyor ve fısıldıyor:{/n} "Gerçekte böyle şeyler olmaz. Bu yalnızca uzun bir rüya ama ben uyanmayı reddediyorum. Buna sahipsem, gerçek hayata gerek yok."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
